channel.title: Knight's Protection
channel.description: I was in a game where I was Alchemist. Someone claimed poisioned, so I was like "sure, let's heal this guy". That night I got the message that I couldn't heal him. Turned out he was Possessor who attacked some guy protected by Knight. I was wondering if Knight's Protection goes through Healing. No, I don't have screenshots. Yes I won the game on Day 4 after that night because we had hanged the Assassin and the MM, and the Knight killed Possessor and Assassin in one night. I do seem to get lucky in my Alchemist games: I have never lost, been attacked or used Emerald Potion. So, does Knight's Protection go through Healing?

item.title: Knight's Protection
item.dc:creator: Lord_Buckethead
item.description:
I was in a game where I was Alchemist. Someone claimed poisioned, so I was like “sure, let’s heal this guy”. That night I got the message that I couldn’t heal him. Turned out he was Possessor who attacked some guy protected by Knight. I was wondering if Knight’s Protection goes through Healing. No, I don’t have screenshots. Yes I won the game on Day 4 after that night because we had hanged the Assassin and the MM, and the Knight killed Possessor and Assassin in one night. I do seem to get lucky in my Alchemist games: I have never lost, been attacked or used Emerald Potion.
So, does Knight’s Protection go through Healing?

Read full topic
